para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 probability < 0 或 probability > 1，则 tinv 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If probability < 0 or if probability > 1, TInv returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If degrees_freedom is not an integer, it is truncated.

para.span: 如果 degrees_freedom < 1，则 tinv 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If degrees_freedom < 1, TInv returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 则 tinv 将返回该值 t，因此 P (|X |> t) = 的概率其中 X 是遵循的 t 分布和 P 随机变量 (|X |> t) = P (X < -t 或 X > t)。

span.span: TInv returns that value t, such that P(|X| > t) = probability where X is a random variable that follows the t-distribution and P(|X| > t) = P(X < -t or X > t).

para.span: 可以由概率替换 2*概率返回单尾 t 值。对于 0.05 的概率和自由度为 10，则双尾值被计算 TINV(0.05,10)，它返回 2.28139。可以使用计算相同的概率和自由度数的单尾值 TINV(2*0.05,10)，其返回 1.812462。

span.span: A one-tailed t-value can be returned by replacing probability with 2*probability. For a probability of 0.05 and degrees of freedom of 10, the two-tailed value is calculated with TINV(0.05,10), which returns 2.28139. The one-tailed value for the same probability and degrees of freedom can be calculated with TINV(2*0.05,10), which returns 1.812462.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Transpose (object Arg1);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Transpose([in]object Arg1) runtime managed
Public Function Transpose (Arg1 As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ Transpose(System::Object ^ Arg1);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Array - 要进行转置的工作表中的单元格数组或区域。所谓数组的转置就是，将数组的第一行作为新数组的第一列，将数组的第二行作为新数组的第二列，依此类推。

span.span: Array - an array or range of cells on a worksheet that you want to transpose. The transpose of an array is created by using the first row of the array as the first column of the new array, the second row of the array as the second column of the new array, and so on.

summary.span: 返回转置单元格区域，即将一行单元格区域转置成一列单元格区域，反之亦然。在行列数分别与数组的行列数相同的区域中，必须将 TRANSPOSE 输入为数组公式。使用 TRANSPOSE 可在工作表中转置数组的垂直和水平方向。

span.span: Returns a vertical range of cells as a horizontal range, or vice versa. TRANSPOSE must be entered as an array formula in a range that has the same number of rows and columns, respectively, as an array has columns and rows. Use TRANSPOSE to shift the vertical and horizontal orientation of an array on a worksheet.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Trend (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3, object Arg4);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Trend([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3, [in]object Arg4) runtime managed
Public Function Trend (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object) As Object

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Known_y's - 关系表达式 y = mx + b 中已知的 y 值集合。

span.span: Known_y's - the set of y-values you already know in the relationship y = mx + b.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Known_x's - 关系表达式 y = mx + b 中可能已知的可选 x 值集合。

span.span: Known_x's - an optional set of x-values that you may already know in the relationship y = mx + b.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: New_x's - 想让 TREND 为其返回对应 y 值的新 x 值。

span.span: New_x's - new x-values for which you want TREND to return corresponding y-values.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Const - 一个逻辑值，用于指定是否强制常量 b 等于 0。

span.span: Const - a logical value specifying whether to force the constant b to equal 0.

summary.span: 返回一条线性回归拟合线的一组纵坐标值（y 值）。即找到适合给定的数组 known_y's 和 known_x's 的直线（用最小二乘法），并返回指定数组 new_x's 值在直线上对应的 y 值。

span.span: Returns values along a linear trend. Fits a straight line (using the method of least squares) to the arrays known_y's and known_x's. Returns the y-values along that line for the array of new_x's that you specify.

para.span: 如果数组 known_y's 在单独一列中，则 known_x's 的每一列被解释为一个独立的变量。

span.span: If the array known_y's is in a single column, then each column of known_x's is interpreted as a separate variable.

para.span: 如果数组 known_y's 在单独一行中，则 known_x's 的每一行被解释为一个独立的变量。

span.span: If the array known_y's is in a single row, then each row of known_x's is interpreted as a separate variable.

para.span: 数组 known_x's 可以包含一组或多组变量。如果只用到一个变量，只要 known_y's 和 known_x's 维数相同，它们就可以是任何形状的区域。如果用到多个变量，则 known_y's 必须为向量（即必须为一行或一列）。

span.span: The array known_x's can include one or more sets of variables. If only one variable is used, known_y's and known_x's can be ranges of any shape, as long as they have equal dimensions. If more than one variable is used, known_y's must be a vector (that is, a range with a height of one row or a width of one column).

para.span: 如果省略 known_x's，则假定该数组为 {1,2,3,...}，其大小与 known_y's 相同。

span.span: If known_x's is omitted, it is assumed to be the array {1,2,3,...} that is the same size as known_y's.

para.span: New_x's 与 known_x's 一样，每个独立变量必须为单独的一列（或一行）。因此，如果 known_y's 是单列的，known_x's 和 new_x's 就必须有同样的列数。如果 known_y's 是单行的，known_x's 和 new_x's 就必须有同样的行数。

span.span: New_x's must include a column (or row) for each independent variable, just as known_x's does. So, if known_y's is in a single column, known_x's and new_x's must have the same number of columns. If known_y's is in a single row, known_x's and new_x's must have the same number of rows.

para.span: 如果省略 new_x's，则将假定它和 known_x's 一样。

span.span: If you omit new_x's, it is assumed to be the same as known_x's.

para.span: 如果 known_x's 和 new_x's 都省略，则将假定它们为数组 {1,2,3,...}，大小与 known_y's 相同。

span.span: If you omit both known_x's and new_x's, they are assumed to be the array {1,2,3,...} that is the same size as known_y's.

para.span: 如果 const 为true或被省略，b 将按正常方式计算。

span.span: If const is true or omitted, b is calculated normally.

para.span: 如果 const 为false，b 将被设置为 0 （零），并 m 值进行调整，以使 y = mx。

span.span: If const is false, b is set equal to 0 (zero), and the m-values are adjusted so that y = mx.

para.span: 有关 Microsoft Excel 如何对数据行的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about how Microsoft Excel fits a line to data, see .

para.span: 回归针对不同乘方的同一变量值来多项式曲线，可以使用趋势。

span.span: You can use Trend for polynomial curve fitting by regressing against the same variable raised to different powers.

para.span: 例如，假设列包含 y 值和 B 列包含 x 值。

span.span: For example, suppose column A contains y-values and column B contains x-values.

para.span: 您可以输入 x ^2 中列 C，x ^3 列 D、 和等等，然后进行回归计算列 B 通过 D 针对 A 列。

span.span: You can enter x^2 in column C, x^3 in column D, and so on, and then regress columns B through D against column A.

para.span: 对于返回结果为数组的公式，必须以数组公式的形式输入。

span.span: Formulas that return arrays must be entered as array formulas.

para.span: 当为参数（如 known_x's）输入数组常量时，应当使用逗号分隔同一行中的各个值，用分号分隔不同行中的值。

span.span: When entering an array constant for an argument such as known_x's, use commas to separate values in the same row and semicolons to separate rows.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Trim (string Arg1);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string Trim([in]string Arg1) runtime managed
Public Function Trim (Arg1 As String) As String
public: System::String ^ Trim(System::String ^ Arg1);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Text - 要从中删除空格的文本。

span.span: Text - the text from which you want spaces removed.

summary.span: 删除文本中的所有空格（除了单词之间的单个空格外）。对于从其他应用程序中获取带有不规则空格的文本，可以使用 TRIM。

span.span: Removes all spaces from text except for single spaces between words. Use TRIM on text that you have received from another application that may have irregular spacing.

para.span: 重要说明： Trim函数旨在修整从文本 7 位 ASCII 空格字符 （值 32）。

span.span: Important: The Trim function was designed to trim the 7-bit ASCII space character (value 32) from text.

para.span: 在 Unicode 字符集，没有称为 160 的十进制值不间断空格字符其他空格字符。

span.span: In the Unicode character set, there is an additional space character called the nonbreaking space character that has a decimal value of 160.

para.span: 此字符作为 HTML 实体，通常用于在网页中&– 文本。

span.span: This character is commonly used in Web pages as the HTML entity,  .

para.span: Trim函数本身不删除此不间断空格字符。

span.span: By itself, the Trim function does not remove this nonbreaking space character.

MemberSignature.Value: public double TrimMean (object Arg1, double Arg2);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 TrimMean([in]object Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2) runtime managed
Public Function TrimMean (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Double) As Double
public: double TrimMean(System::Object ^ Arg1, double Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Array - 要进行剪裁并求平均值的数值数组或区域。

span.span: Array - the array or range of values to trim and average.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Percent - 计算时所要排除的数据点所占的比例，例如，如果 percent = 0.2，在 20 个数据点的集合中，就要除去 4 个数据点 (20 x 0.2)：头部除去 2 个，尾部除去 2 个。

span.span: Percent - the fractional number of data points to exclude from the calculation. For example, if percent = 0.2, 4 points are trimmed from a data set of 20 points (20 x 0.2): 2 from the top and 2 from the bottom of the set.

summary.span: 返回数据集的内部平均值。函数 TRIMMEAN 先从数据集的头部和尾部除去一定百分比的数据点，然后再求平均值。当希望在分析中剔除一部分数据的计算时，可以使用此函数。

span.span: Returns the mean of the interior of a data set. TRIMMEAN calculates the mean taken by excluding a percentage of data points from the top and bottom tails of a data set. You can use this function when you wish to exclude outlying data from your analysis.

para.span: 如果 percent < 0 或 % > 1，则 trimmean 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If percent < 0 or percent > 1, TrimMean returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: TrimMean舍入到最接近 2 的倍数的排除的数据点的个数。

span.span: TrimMean rounds the number of excluded data points down to the nearest multiple of 2.

para.span: 如果 percent = 0.1，10%的 30 数据点等于 3 磅。

span.span: If percent = 0.1, 10 percent of 30 data points equals 3 points.

para.span: 对称，则 trimmean 将从顶部和底部的数据集的排除单个值。

span.span: For symmetry, TrimMean excludes a single value from the top and bottom of the data set.

MemberSignature.Value: public double TTest (object Arg1, object Arg2, double Arg3, double Arg4);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 TTest([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]float64 Arg3, [in]float64 Arg4) runtime managed
Public Function TTest (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Double, Arg4 As Double) As Double
public: double TTest(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2, double Arg3, double Arg4);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: array1 - 第一个数据集。

span.span: Array1 - the first data set.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: array2 - 第二个数据集。

span.span: Array2 - the second data set.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: tails - 指定分布的尾数。如果 tails = 1，则 TTEST 将使用单尾分布。如果 tails = 2，则 TTEST 将使用双尾分布。

span.span: Tails - specifies the number of distribution tails. If tails = 1, TTEST uses the one-tailed distribution. If tails = 2, TTEST uses the two-tailed distribution.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: type - 要执行的 t 检验的种类。

span.span: Type - the kind of t-Test to perform.

summary.span: 返回与学生 t 检验相关的概率。可以使用函数 TTEST 判断两个样本是否可能来自两个具有相同平均值的总体。

span.span: Returns the probability associated with a Student's t-Test. Use TTEST to determine whether two samples are likely to have come from the same two underlying populations that have the same mean.

para.span: 重要说明： 此功能已替换为一个或多个新函数的可能提供提高的准确性并将其姓名更好地反映其使用情况。

span.span: Important: This function has been replaced with one or more new functions that may provide improved accuracy and whose names better reflect their usage.

para.span: 此函数是与早期版本的 Excel 的兼容性仍可用。

span.span: This function is still available for compatibility with earlier versions of Excel.

para.span: 但是，如果不需要向后兼容性，则您应考虑使用的新功能从现在起，因为它们更准确地描述其功能。

span.span: However, if backward compatibility is not required, you should consider using the new functions from now on, because they more accurately describe their functionality.

para.span: 有关新函数的详细信息，请参阅方法。

span.span: For more information about the new function, see the method.

item.description: 双样本不等方差 （异方差）

para.span: 如果 array1 和 array2 的数据点，并键入不同数量 = 1 （成对），则 ttest 将返回错误值 # n/A。

span.span: If array1 and array2 have a different number of data points, and type = 1 (paired), TTest returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 参数 tails 和 type 将被截尾取整。

span.span: The tails and type arguments are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 tails 或 type 为非数值型，则 ttest 将返回 #VALUE ！。

span.span: If tails or type is nonnumeric, TTest returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 tails 不为 1 或 2，则 ttest 将返回 #NUM ！。

span.span: If tails is any value other than 1 or 2, TTest returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 则 ttest 将使用 array1 和 array2 中的数据计算非负 t-统计。

span.span: TTest uses the data in array1 and array2 to compute a non-negative t-statistic.

para.span: 如果 tails = 1，则 ttest 将返回 array1 和 array2 都取自具有相同的平均值的示例假定 t 统计更高的值的概率。

span.span: If tails=1, TTest returns the probability of a higher value of the t-statistic under the assumption that array1 and array2 are samples from populations with the same mean.

para.span: 则 ttest 将返回的值时 tails = 2 是双精度值，当 tails = 1，并对应于"总体平均值相同"假设 t 统计较高绝对值的概率。

span.span: The value returned by TTest when tails=2 is double that returned when tails=1 and corresponds to the probability of a higher absolute value of the t-statistic under the “same population means” assumption.

MemberSignature.Value: public string USDollar (double Arg1, double Arg2);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string USDollar([in]float64 Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2) runtime managed
Public Function USDollar (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double) As String
public: System::String ^ USDollar(double Arg1, double Arg2);

param.name: Arg1
param.span: 对包含数字的单元格的引用，或求值结果为数值的公式。

span.span: A reference to a cell containing a number, or a formula that evaluates to a number.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 小数点右边的位数。如果 Arg2 为负数，则数字向小数点的左边舍入。如果省略小数，则假定其值为 2。

span.span: The number of digits to the right of the decimal point. If Arg2 is negative, the number is rounded to the left of the decimal point. If you omit decimals, it is assumed to be 2.

summary.span: 将数字转换为文本格式并应用货币符号。方法的名称（及其应用的货币符号）取决于语言设置。

span.span: Converts a number to text format and applies a currency symbol. The name of the method (and the symbol that it applies) depends upon the language settings.

para.span: USDollar方法将数字转换为使用舍入到指定位置的小数的货币格式的文本。

span.span: The USDollar method converts a number to text using currency format, with the decimals rounded to the specified place.

para.span: 包含单元格格式命令带数字的单元格和格式的号码直接与的主要区别方法是，将其结果转换为文本。

span.span: The major difference between formatting a cell that contains a number with the Format Cells command and formatting a number directly with the method is that converts its result to text.

para.span: 使用单元格格式命令设置格式的数字仍是一个数字。

span.span: A number formatted with the Format Cells command is still a number.

para.span: 您可以继续使用的数字格式以中公式，因为 Excel 转换到号码输入作为文本值，则在计算的号码。

span.span: You can continue to use numbers formatted with in formulas, because Excel converts numbers entered as text values to numbers when it calculates.

Public Function Vdb (Arg1 As Double, Arg2 As Double, Arg3 As Double, Arg4 As Double, Arg5 As Double, Optional Arg6 As Object, Optional Arg7 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Cost - 资产的初始成本。

span.span: Cost - the initial cost of the asset.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Salvage - 资产在折旧期末的价值（有时也称为资产残值）。此值可为 0。

span.span: Salvage - the value at the end of the depreciation (sometimes called the salvage value of the asset). This value can be 0.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Life - 资产进行折旧计算的周期数（有时也称作资产的生命周期）。

span.span: Life - the number of periods over which the asset is depreciated (sometimes called the useful life of the asset).

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Start_period - 要为其进行折旧计算的起始期间。Start_period 必须与 life 使用相同的单位。

span.span: Start_period - the starting period for which you want to calculate the depreciation. Start_period must use the same units as life.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: End_period - 要为其进行折旧计算的截止期间。End_period 必须与 life 使用相同的单位。

span.span: End_period - the ending period for which you want to calculate the depreciation. End_period must use the same units as life.

param.name: Arg6
param.span: 系数-余额递减频率的速率。

span.span: Factor - the rate at which the balance declines.

param.span: 如果省略因素，则假定为 2 （双倍余额递减法）。

span.span: If factor is omitted, it is assumed to be 2 (the double-declining balance method).

param.span: 如果不想使用双倍余额递减法，则请改变 factor 的值。

span.span: Change factor if you do not want to use the double-declining balance method.

param.span: 双倍余额递减法的说明，请参阅。

span.span: For a description of the double-declining balance method, see .

param.name: Arg7
param.span: No_switch - 一个逻辑值，指定当折旧值大于余额递减计算值时，是否转用直线折旧法。

span.span: No_switch - a logical value specifying whether to switch to straight-line depreciation when depreciation is greater than the declining balance calculation.

summary.span: 使用双倍余额递减法或其他指定的方法，返回指定的任何期间内（包括部分期间）的资产折旧值。函数 VDB 代表可变余额递减法。

span.span: Returns the depreciation of an asset for any period you specify, including partial periods, using the double-declining balance method or some other method you specify. VDB stands for variable declining balance.

para.span: 如果 no_switch 为true，Microsoft Excel 也不转用直线折旧法即使折旧值大于余额递减计算。

span.span: If no_switch is true, Microsoft Excel does not switch to straight-line depreciation even when the depreciation is greater than the declining balance calculation.

para.span: 如果 no_switch 为false或被省略，Excel 就会转用直线折旧法，当折旧值大于余额递减计算。

span.span: If no_switch is false or omitted, Excel switches to straight-line depreciation when depreciation is greater than the declining balance calculation.

MemberSignature.Value: public object VLookup (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3, object Arg4);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object VLookup([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3, [in]object Arg4) runtime managed
Public Function VLookup (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object) As Object

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Lookup_value - 要在表格数组第一列中搜索的值。Lookup_value 可以为值或引用。如果 lookup_value 小于 table_array 第一列中的最小值，则 VLOOKUP 将返回错误值 #N/A。

span.span: Lookup_value - the value to search in the first column of the table array. Lookup_value can be a value or a reference. If lookup_value is smaller than the smallest value in the first column of table_array, VLOOKUP returns the #N/A error value.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Table_array - 两列或更多列数据。可以使用对区域或区域名称的引用。table_array 第一列中的值是由 lookup_value 搜索的值。这些值可以是文本、数字或逻辑值。不区分大小写。

span.span: Table_array - two or more columns of data. Use a reference to a range or a range name. The values in the first column of table_array are the values searched by lookup_value. These values can be text, numbers, or logical values. Uppercase and lowercase text are equivalent.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Col_index_num - table_array 中待返回的匹配值的列号。col_index_num 为 1 时，返回 table_array 第一列中的值；col_index_num 为 2 时，返回 table_array 第二列中的值，依此类推。

span.span: Col_index_num - the column number in table_array from which the matching value must be returned. A col_index_num of 1 returns the value in the first column in table_array; a col_index_num of 2 returns the value in the second column in table_array, and so on.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Range_lookup-一个逻辑值，指定是否希望方法，以查找完全匹配或近似匹配：

span.span: Range_lookup - a logical value that specifies whether you want the method to find an exact match or an approximate match:

summary.span: 在表格数组的首列查找值，并由此返回表格数组当前行中其他列的值。

span.span: Searches for a value in the first column of a table array and returns a value in the same row from another column in the table array.

para.span: 在VLookup V 代表垂直。

span.span: The V in VLookup stands for vertical.

para.span: 使用VLookup方法而不是方法时要查找的数据的左侧列中位于比较值。

span.span: Use the VLookup method instead of the method when your comparison values are located in a column to the left of the data that you want to find.

para.span: 如果 Col_index_num 小于 1，则VLookup方法将生成一个错误。

span.span: If Col_index_num is less than 1, the VLookup method generates an error.

para.span: 如果 Col_index_num 大于 table_array 中的列数，则VLookup方法将生成一个错误。

span.span: If Col_index_num is greater than the number of columns in table_array, the VLookup method generates an error.

para.span: 如果 Range_lookup 为true或被省略，则返回的确切或近似匹配。

span.span: If Range_lookup is true or omitted, an exact or approximate match is returned.

para.span: 如果找不到完全匹配，则返回下一个小于 lookup_value 的最大值。

span.span: If an exact match is not found, the next largest value that is less than lookup_value is returned.

para.span: Table_array 第一列中的值必须位于升序排序;否则，则VLookup方法可能无法提供的正确值。

span.span: The values in the first column of table_array must be placed in ascending sort order; otherwise, the VLookup method may not give the correct value.

para.span: 如果 Range_lookup 为false，则VLookup方法将只查找完全匹配。

span.span: If Range_lookup is false, the VLookup method will only find an exact match.

para.span: 在这种情况下，table_array 第一列中的值不需要进行排序。

span.span: In this case, the values in the first column of table_array do not need to be sorted.

para.span: 如果有两个或多个值 table_array 第一列中的符合 lookup_value，则使用找到的第一个值。

span.span: If there are two or more values in the first column of table_array that match the lookup_value, the first value found is used.

para.span: 如果找不到完全匹配，则生成错误。

span.span: If an exact match is not found, an error is generated.

para.span: 搜索时文本值 table_array 第一列中，确保 table_array 第一列中的数据不具有前导空格，尾随空格，不一致使用表情的 (或") 和花 (或") 引号或非打印字符。

span.span: When searching text values in the first column of table_array, ensure that the data in the first column of table_array does not have leading spaces, trailing spaces, inconsistent use of straight ( ' or " ) and curly ( ‘ or “) quotation marks, or nonprinting characters.

para.span: 在这些情况下，则VLookup方法可能会给不正确或意外的值。

span.span: In these cases, the VLookup method may give an incorrect or unexpected value.

para.span: 有关如何进行清理或修整值的信息，请参阅和方法。

span.span: For information about how to clean or trim values, see the and methods.

para.span: 搜索时数字或日期值，确保 table_array 第一列中的数据，不存储为文本值。

span.span: When searching number or date values, ensure that the data in the first column of table_array is not stored as text values.

para.span: 在这种情况下，则VLookup方法可能会给不正确或意外的值。

span.span: In this case, the VLookup method may give an incorrect or unexpected value.

para.span: 如果 range_lookup 为false ，并且 lookup_value 是文本，您可以使用通配符，问号 (?) 和 lookup_value 中的星号 （\*）。

span.span: If range_lookup is false and lookup_value is text, then you can use the wildcard characters, question mark (?) and asterisk (\*), in lookup_value.

para.span: 问号匹配任意单个字符;星号匹配任意字符的序列。

span.span: A question mark matches any single character; an asterisk matches any sequence of characters.

para.span: 如果您想要查找实际问号或星号，键入该字符前波形符 （~）。

span.span: If you want to find an actual question mark or asterisk, type a tilde (~) preceding the character.

Public Function Weekday (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Serial_number - 一个序列号，代表尝试查找的那一天的日期。日期应使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。例如，使用 DATE(2008,5,23) 输入 2008 年 5 月 23 日。如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Serial_number - a sequential number that represents the date of the day you are trying to find. Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions. For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008. Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Return_type - 确定返回值类型的数字。

span.span: Return_type - a number that determines the type of return value.

summary.span: 返回与日期对应的一周中的某一天。默认情况下，其值为 1（星期日）到 7（星期六）之间的整数。

span.span: Returns the day of the week corresponding to a date. The day is given as an integer, ranging from 1 (Sunday) to 7 (Saturday), by default.

item.description: 数字 1 （星期日） 到 7 （星期六）。与早期版本的 Microsoft Excel 相似之处。
数字 1 （星期一） 到 7 （星期日）。
数字 0 （星期一） 到 6 （星期日）。
数字 1 （星期一） 到 7 （星期日）。
数字 1 （星期二） 到 7 （星期一）
数字 1 （星期三） 到 7 （星期二）
数字 1 （星期四） 到 7 （星期三）
数字 1 （星期五） 到 7 （星期四）
数字 1 （星期六） 到 7 （星期五）
数字 1 （星期日） 到 7 （星期六）
Numbers 1 (Sunday) through 7 (Saturday). Behaves like previous versions of Microsoft Excel.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

Public Function WeekNum (Arg1 As Object, Optional Arg2 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Serial_num - 一周中的日期。日期应使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。例如，使用 DATE(2008,5,23) 输入 2008 年 5 月 23 日。如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Serial_num - a date within the week. Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions. For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008. Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Return_type - 一个数字，确定一个星期从哪一天开始。默认值为 1。

span.span: Return_type - a number that determines on which day the week begins. The default is 1.

summary.span: 返回一个数字，指示一年中的第几周。

span.span: Returns a number that indicates where the week falls numerically within a year.

para.span: 重要说明： WeekNum函数认为包含月 1 日为一年的第一周的周。

span.span: Important: The WeekNum function considers the week containing January 1 to be the first week of the year.

para.span: 但是，没有定义的第一周为一天的大部分 （四个或更多） 中新的一年欧洲标准。

span.span: However, there is a European standard that defines the first week as the one with the majority of days (four or more) falling in the new year.

para.span: 这意味着，有年顺序为三天或更少年 1 月的第一周， WeekNum函数返回的周数是根据欧洲标准不正确。

span.span: This means that for years in which there are three days or less in the first week of January, the WeekNum function returns week numbers that are incorrect according to the European standard.

item.description: 星期开始于星期日。Weekdays 进行编号 1 至 7。
星期开始于星期一。Weekdays 进行编号 1 至 7。
Week begins on Sunday. Weekdays are numbered 1 through 7.
Week begins on Monday. Weekdays are numbered 1 through 7.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

MemberSignature.Value: public double WorkDay (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 WorkDay([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function WorkDay (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Start_date - 代表开始日期的日期。

span.span: Start_date - a date that represents the start date.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Days - Start_date 之前或之后不含周末及节假日的天数。Days 为正值将产生未来日期；为负值将产生过去日期。

span.span: Days - the number of nonweekend and nonholiday days before or after start_date. A positive value for days yields a future date; a negative value yields a past date.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Holidays - 可选的列表，包含要从工作日历中排除的一个或多个日期，如各种省/市/自治区和国家/地区的法定假日和非法定假日。该列表可以是包含日期的单元格区域，也可以是由代表日期的序列号所构成的数组常量。

span.span: Holidays - an optional list of one or more dates to exclude from the working calendar, such as state and federal holidays and floating holidays. The list can be either a range of cells that contain the dates or an array constant of the serial numbers that represent the dates.

summary.span: 返回某日期（起始日期）之前或之后相隔指定工作日的某一日期的日期值。工作日不包括周末和节假日。在计算发票到期日、预期交货时间或工作天数时，可以使用函数 WORKDAY 来扣除周末或节假日。

span.span: Returns a number that represents a date that is the indicated number of working days before or after a date (the starting date). Working days exclude weekends and any dates identified as holidays. Use WORKDAY to exclude weekends or holidays when you calculate invoice due dates, expected delivery times, or the number of days of work performed.

para.span: 重要提示： 通过使用 DATE 函数，或作为其他公式或函数的结果应输入日期。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果以文本形式输入的日期，则会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text .

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 如果任一参数不是有效日期，则 WorkDay将返回 #VALUE ！

span.span: If any argument is not a valid date, WorkDay returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 start_date 加 days 产生无效日期，则 WorkDay将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If start_date plus days yields an invalid date, WorkDay returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 days 不是整数，则将被截尾取整。

span.span: If days is not an integer, it is truncated.

MemberSignature.Value: public double WorkDay_Intl (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3, object Arg4);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 WorkDay_Intl([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3, [in]object Arg4) runtime managed
Public Function WorkDay_Intl (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object, Optional Arg4 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Start_date-开始日期，截断成整数。

span.span: Start_date - The start date, truncated to integer.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 天-之前或之后 start_date 的工作日数。

span.span: Days - The number of workdays before or after the start_date.

param.span: 正值生成将来;负值生成过去的日期;0 （零） 的值生成 start_date。

span.span: A positive value yields a future date; a negative value yields a past date; a 0 (zero) value yields the start_date.

param.span: 日期偏移量被截断为一个整数值。

span.span: Day-offset is truncated to an integer.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: 周末-指示星期几的为周末并且不会考虑工作日。

span.span: Weekend - Indicates the days of the week that are weekend days and are not considered working days.

param.span: 周末是 weekend 数值或周末发生指定的字符串。

span.span: Weekend is a weekend number or string that specifies when weekends occur.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: 假日的一组可选的一个或多个要排除从日历工作日的日期。

span.span: Holidays - An optional set of one or more dates that are to be excluded from the working day calendar.

param.span: 包含日期、 的单元格区域或数组常量串行值表示两个日期的假日。

span.span: Holidays is a range of cells that contain the dates, or an array constant of the serial values that represent those dates.

param.span: 可以是任意顺序的日期或串行值在假日。

span.span: The ordering of dates or serial values in holidays can be arbitrary.

summary.span: 使用自定义周末参数返回指定数量的工作日之前或之后的日期的序列号。周末参数指示哪些日期为周末以及周末的天数。周末以及指定为节假日的任何日期都不被视为工作日。

span.span: Returns the serial number of the date before or after a specified number of workdays with custom weekend parameters. Weekend parameters indicate which and how many days are weekend days. Weekend days and any days that are specified as holidays are not considered as workdays.

para.span: 如果 start_date 超出了当前日期基值的范围，则 workday_intl 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If start_date is out of range for the current date base value, WorkDay_Intl returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 holidays 中的任何日期超出了当前日期基值的范围，则 workday_intl 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If any date in holidays is out of range for the current date base value, WorkDay_Intl returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 start_date 加日期偏移量产生无效日期，则 workday_intl 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If start_date plus day-offset yields an invalid date, WorkDay_Intl returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 weekend 字符串的长度无效或包含无效字符，则 workday_intl 将返回 #VALUE ！

span.span: If a weekend string is of invalid length or contains invalid characters, WorkDay_Intl returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Xirr (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Xirr([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function Xirr (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Values - 与 dates 中的付款计划对应的一系列现金流。第一个付款是可选的，与投资开始时的成本或付款对应。第一个值如果是成本或付款，就必须是负值。所有后续付款都基于 365 天/年贴现。这一系列值中必须至少包含一个正值和一个负值。

span.span: Values - a series of cash flows that corresponds to a schedule of payments in dates. The first payment is optional and corresponds to a cost or payment that occurs at the beginning of the investment. If the first value is a cost or payment, it must be a negative value. All succeeding payments are discounted based on a 365-day year. The series of values must contain at least one positive and one negative value.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Dates - 与现金流付款对应的付款日期计划。第一个付款日期表示付款计划的开始。所有其他日期都必须晚于此日期，但相互顺序是任意的。日期应使用 DATE 函数输入，或者作为其他公式或函数的结果输入。例如，使用 DATE(2008,5,23) 输入 2008 年 5 月 23 日。如果日期以文本形式输入，将会出现问题。

span.span: Dates - a schedule of payment dates that corresponds to the cash flow payments. The first payment date indicates the beginning of the schedule of payments. All other dates must be later than this date, but they may occur in any order. Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions. For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008. Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Guess-一个据您推测是接近Xirr结果的数字。

span.span: Guess - a number that you guess is close to the result of Xirr.

summary.span: 返回一组现金流的内部收益率，这些现金流不一定定期发生。若要计算一组定期现金流的内部收益率，请使用函数 IRR。

span.span: Returns the internal rate of return for a schedule of cash flows that is not necessarily periodic. To calculate the internal rate of return for a series of periodic cash flows, use the IRR function.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: dates 中的数字将被截尾取整。

span.span: Numbers in dates are truncated to integers.

para.span: Xirr要求至少一个正现金流和一个负现金流;否则， xirr 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: Xirr expects at least one positive cash flow and one negative cash flow; otherwise, Xirr returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 dates 中的任何数字不是有效日期， xirr 将返回 #VALUE ！

span.span: If any number in dates is not a valid date, Xirr returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 dates 中的任何数字之前的开始日期， xirr 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If any number in dates precedes the starting date, Xirr returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 values 和 dates 值的数目不同， xirr 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If values and dates contain a different number of values, Xirr returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 在大多数情况下不需要提供 guess， xirr 将计算结果。

span.span: In most cases you do not need to provide guess for the Xirr calculation.

para.span: 如果省略，则假定 guess 为 0.1 （10%)。

span.span: If omitted, guess is assumed to be 0.1 (10 percent).

para.span: Xirr 将与紧密相关、 净现值函数。

span.span: Xirr is closely related to , the net present value function.

para.span: Xirr 将通过计算的回报率是对应于 XNPV 利率 = 0。

para.span: Excel 计算xirr 将使用的迭代的方法。

span.span: Excel uses an iterative technique for calculating Xirr.

para.span: 使用 （从 guess 开始） 不断变化率， xirr 将进行循环计算，直到结果 0.000001%。

public: double Xnpv(System::Object ^ Arg1, System::Object ^ Arg2);

span.span: A schedule of payment dates that corresponds to the cash flow payments. The first payment date indicates the beginning of the schedule of payments. All other dates must be later than this date, but they may occur in any order.

summary.span: 返回不一定是定期计划的现金流的净现值。

span.span: Returns the net present value for a schedule of cash flows that is not necessarily periodic.

para.span: 重要说明： Xnpv方法不提供对应于 （= XNPV （率、 值、 日期）） 的速率参数所需的相应 XNPV 函数的参数。

para.span: 若要计算组定期现金流的净现值，使用方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public double YearFrac (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 YearFrac([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function YearFrac (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Start_date - 代表开始日期的日期。

span.span: Start_date - a date that represents the start date.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: End_date - 代表结束日期的日期。

span.span: End_date - a date that represents the end date.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Basis - 要使用的日计数基准类型。

span.span: Basis - the type of day count basis to use.

summary.span: 返回 start_date 和 end_date 之间的天数占全年天数的百分比。使用 YEARFRAC 工作表函数可判别某一特定条件下全年效益或债务的比例。

span.span: Calculates the fraction of the year represented by the number of whole days between two dates (the start_date and the end_date). Use the YEARFRAC worksheet function to identify the proportion of a whole year's benefits or obligations to assign to a specific term.

para.span: 重要提示： 通过使用 DATE 函数，或作为其他公式或函数的结果应输入日期。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果以文本形式输入的日期，则会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 所有参数都将被截尾取整。

span.span: All arguments are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 start_date 或 end_date 不是有效日期，则 yearfrac 将返回 #VALUE ！

span.span: If start_date or end_date are not valid dates, YearFrac returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或者，如果基础>4，则 yearfrac 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, YearFrac returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

MemberSignature.Value: public double YieldDisc (object Arg1, object Arg2, object Arg3, object Arg4, object Arg5);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 YieldDisc([in]object Arg1, [in]object Arg2, [in]object Arg3, [in]object Arg4, [in]object Arg5) runtime managed
Public Function YieldDisc (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Object, Arg3 As Object, Arg4 As Object, Optional Arg5 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: Settlement - 债券的结算日。债券的结算日是在发行日之后债券卖给购买者的日期。

span.span: Settlement - the security's settlement date. The security settlement date is the date after the issue date when the security is traded to the buyer.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: Maturity - 债券的到期日。到期日是债券有效期截止时的日期。

span.span: Maturity - the security's maturity date. The maturity date is the date when the security expires.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: Pr - 面值 ￥100 的债券的现价。

span.span: Pr - the security's price per $100 face value.

param.name: Arg4
param.span: Redemption - 面值 ￥100 的债券的赎回值。

span.span: Redemption - the security's redemption value per $100 face value.

param.name: Arg5
param.span: Basis - 要使用的日计数基准类型。

span.span: Basis - the type of day count basis to use.

summary.span: 返回已贴现债券的年收益。

span.span: Returns the annual yield for a discounted security.

para.span: 重要提示： 通过使用 DATE 函数，或作为其他公式或函数的结果应输入日期。

span.span: Important: Dates should be entered by using the DATE function, or as results of other formulas or functions.
For example, use DATE(2008,5,23) for the 23rd day of May, 2008.

para.span: 如果以文本形式输入的日期，则会出现问题。

span.span: Problems can occur if dates are entered as text.

para.span: Microsoft Excel 以序数形式存储日期以使其可用于计算。默认情况下，1900 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 1；2008 年 1 月 1 日的序数是 39448，因为该日期距 1900 年 1 月 1 日有 39,448 天。Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh 使用另外一个默认日期系统。

span.span: Microsoft Excel stores dates as sequential serial numbers so they can be used in calculations. By default, January 1, 1900 is serial number 1, and January 1, 2008 is serial number 39448 because it is 39,448 days after January 1, 1900. Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh uses a different date system as its default.

para.span: 结算日是购买者买入息票（如债券）的日期。到期日是息票有效期截止时的日期。例如，在 2008 年 1 月 1 日发行的 30 年期债券，六个月后被购买者买走。则发行日为 2008 年 1 月 1 日，结算日为 2008 年 7 月 1 日，而到期日则是在发行日 2008 年 1 月 1 日的 30 年后，即 2038 年 1 月 1 日。

span.span: The settlement date is the date a buyer purchases a coupon, such as a bond. The maturity date is the date when a coupon expires. For example, suppose a 30-year bond is issued on January 1, 2008, and is purchased by a buyer six months later. The issue date would be January 1, 2008, the settlement date would be July 1, 2008, and the maturity date would be January 1, 2038, which is 30 years after the January 1, 2008, issue date.

para.span: Settlement、maturity 和 basis 将被截尾取整。

span.span: Settlement, maturity, and basis are truncated to integers.

para.span: 如果 settlement 或 maturity 不是有效日期，则 yielddisc 将返回 #VALUE ！

span.span: If settlement or maturity is not a valid date, YieldDisc returns the #VALUE!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 pr ≤ 0 或 redemption ≤ 0，则 yielddisc 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If pr ≤ 0 or if redemption ≤ 0, YieldDisc returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 basis < 0 或者，如果基础>4，则 yielddisc 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If basis < 0 or if basis > 4, YieldDisc returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

para.span: 如果 settlement ≥ maturity，则 yielddisc 将返回 #NUM ！

span.span: If settlement ≥ maturity, YieldDisc returns the #NUM!

para.span: 错误值。

span.span: error value.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Z_Test (object Arg1, double Arg2, object Arg3);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance float64 Z_Test([in]object Arg1, [in]float64 Arg2, [in]object Arg3) runtime managed
Public Function Z_Test (Arg1 As Object, Arg2 As Double, Optional Arg3 As Object) As Double

param.name: Arg1
param.span: array 为要针对其检验假设总体平均值的数组和数据区域。

span.span: Array is the array or range of data against which to test the hypothesized population mean.

param.name: Arg2
param.span: 要检验的值。

span.span: The value to test.

param.name: Arg3
param.span: sigma - 总体（已知）标准偏差。如果省略，则使用样本标准偏差。

span.span: Sigma - The population (known) standard deviation. If omitted, the sample standard deviation is used.

summary.span: 返回 z 检验的单尾概率值。对于给定的假设总体平均值，Z_TEST 返回样本平均值大于数据集（数组）中观察平均值（即观察样本平均值）的概率。

span.span: Returns the one-tailed probability-value of a z-test. For a given hypothesized population mean, Z_TEST returns the probability that the sample mean would be greater than the average of observations in the data set (array) — that is, the observed sample mean.

para.span: 如果 array 为空，则 Z_Test将返回错误值 # n/A。

span.span: If array is empty, Z_Test returns the #N/A error value.

para.span: 未省略西格玛时， Z_Test的如下所示计算：

span.span: Z_Test is calculated as follows when sigma is not omitted:

para.span: 图 1： 未省略西格玛时的 Z_Test 等式

span.span: Figure 1: Equation for Z_Test when sigma is not omitted

para.span: 省略 sigma 时，其计算公式如下：

span.span: or when sigma is omitted:

para.span: 图 2： 省略西格玛时的 Z_Test 等式

span.span: Figure 2: Equation for Z_Test when sigma is omitted

para.span: 其中，x 为样本平均值 AVERAGE(array)；s 为样本标准偏差 STDEV_S(array)；n 为样本中的观察值个数 COUNT(array)。

span.span: where x is the sample mean AVERAGE(array); s is the sample standard deviation STDEV_S(array); and n is the number of observations in the sample COUNT(array).

para.span: Z_Test表示当基础总体平均值为 μ0，将导致样本平均值大于观察值 average （array）。

span.span: Z_Test represents the probability that the sample mean would be greater than the observed value AVERAGE(array), when the underlying population mean is μ0.

para.span: 对称的正态分布，如果 average （array) < μ0， Z_Test的返回值将大于 0.5。

span.span: From the symmetry of the Normal distribution, if AVERAGE(array) < μ0, Z_Test will return a value greater than 0.5.

para.span: 可以使用以下 Excel 公式来计算双尾概率样本平均值 average （array），比 μ0 （在两个方向） 从当基础总体平均值为 μ0:

span.span: The following Excel formula can be used to calculate the two-tailed probability that the sample mean would be further from μ0 (in either direction) than AVERAGE(array), when the underlying population mean is μ0:

para.span: = 2 \* MIN(Z_TEST(array,μ0,sigma)，1-Z_TEST(array,μ0,sigma))。

span.span: =2 \* MIN(Z_TEST(array,μ0,sigma), 1 - Z_TEST(array,μ0,sigma)).

para.span: ZTest表示当基础总体平均值为 μ0，将导致样本平均值大于观察值 average （array）。

span.span: ZTest represents the probability that the sample mean would be greater than the observed value AVERAGE(array), when the underlying population mean is μ0.

para.span: 对称的正态分布，如果 average （array) < μ0，ZTEST 的返回值将大于 0.5。
